channel.title: Research on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Research on C'est la Z

item.title: How my views on education research were shaped
item.description: After reading a couple of comments on my last post where I talked a bit about practitioners vs researchers I thought I'd expand and expound a bit. While there are education researchers that I very much respect, overall, I'm skeptical of education research. Note that I'm not talking specifically about CS Ed research but rather education research in general. Let's go back to the beginning. I entered teaching from industry. Goldman Sachs to be specific.
